testcase.name: testSendProxyError

error.message:
Mockito cannot mock this class: class engine.ProxyEngine.
If you're not sure why you're getting this error, please open an issue on GitHub.
Java : 25 JVM vendor name : Homebrew JVM vendor version : 25.0.1 JVM name : OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM JVM version : 25.0.1 JVM info : mixed mode, sharing OS name : Mac OS X OS version : 26.1
You are seeing this disclaimer because Mockito is configured to create inlined mocks. You can learn about inline mocks and their limitations under item #39 of the Mockito class javadoc.
Underlying exception : org.mockito.exceptions.base.MockitoException: Could not modify all classes [class engine.ProxyEngine, class java.lang.Object, interface engine.Engine]
